title: Apple Reacts to Being Forced to Allow Other App Stores
description:
Apple will be forced by the EU to allow third-party app stores onto iPhones & iPads. And… they’re not happy about it.

Apple Responds to Switching iPhone to USB-C: https://youtu.be/h9TGeDKZt14

ARTICLES

Apple Planning to Allow Third-Party App Store Alternatives on iPhone: https://9to5mac.com/2022/12/13/apple-alternative-app-stores-iphone/

https://completemusicupdate.com/article/apple-planning-to-allow-alternate-app-stores-on-ios-devices-to-comply-with-new-eu-rules/
